data.message:
ISIS is another scam for war like AL QUAIDA,they do this to manipulate there own people for war...RUSSIA and USA made a deal,russia can take CRIMEA and we can destroy SYRIA(SIBEL EDMONDS was first to talk about this)..the EDWARD SNOWDEN story is a lie to make you think russia is our enemy,so that you wont catch on to what is really going on...i tell you this because usa stepped on canada to put that monsanto bullshit in my food...anybody else find it strange there was anthrax letters after 911 and ricine letters after the boston bombing?its called modus operandi and the cia has 1...lol stupid dumbass if you ask me...THE GOVERNMENT AND MEDIA ARE TRAITORS..(BOSTON BOMBING,RICINE LETTERS,WEST FERTILIZER EXPLOSION)all part of same plot..sibel edmonds says ruslan tsarni is C.I.A
we all know 911 was a false flag....what if i tell you the boston bombing is not what we were told...Tamerlan tsarneav is a spy sent by the u.s government in tchetchnia to trap terrorists...he was called the american while he was there,he grew a big beard and told everyone he wanted to do islamic jihad..he was successfull in his mission of trapping terror suspects,the guys who met him are all dead killed by the fsb....they did a false flag to make the terrorists think usa is not in on it,in there minds this is a safe way of ending it,because the terrorists who are left are supposed to think he was really a terrorist if he did that..the official story says he fled tchetcnia after his friends were killed by fear of also being killed,but in reality they ended the mission..sibel edmonds(ex fbi) says ruslan tsarni the uncle is cia...
